pages.text: The 'Trial Guardian' is the third boss in Terramity's progression.$(br2)It can be summoned by inserting a spire key in the lock found in a Trial Spire.$(br2)Recommended Gear:$(br) -Dimlite/Virentium/Cosmilite armor$(br) -Strong melee weapon
Can be summoned by inserting a spire key in the lock found in a Trial Spire. Trial Spires can be found anywhere in the ocean$(br2)Spire keys can be found throughout the Trial Spire
The Trial Guardian drops a perish staff when defeated, a necessary item to progress. Using the perish staff on bedrock black matter ore will decay it, allowing it to be mined.
